COMMENT: TODO: maybe use sUNC docs to improve https://github.com/sUNC-Utilities/Global-Functions-Documentation

@roblox/global/getfunctionhash/param/0.documentation: The function to get the hash of.

@roblox/global/getfunctionhash/return/0.documentation: A Hex represented SHA384 hash of the function's bytecode.

@roblox/global/getfunctionhash.documentation: Returns a Hex represented SHA384 hash of the provided function's re-built bytecode, for C closures the c.f pointer should be hashed.

@roblox/global/cache.invalidate.documentation: Deletes `object` from the Instance cache. Effectively invalidates `object` as a reference to the underlying Instance.

@roblox/global/cache.iscached.documentation: Checks whether `object` exists in the Instance cache.

@roblox/global/cache.replace.documentation: Replaces `object` in the Instance cache with `newObject`.

@roblox/global/cloneref.documentation: Returns a copy of the Instance reference to `object`. This is useful for managing an Instance without directly referencing it.

@roblox/global/compareinstances.documentation: Returns whether `a` and `b` both reference the same Instance.

@roblox/global/checkcaller.documentation:
Returns whether the function currently running was called by the executor.

This is useful for metamethod hooks that behave differently when called by the game.

@roblox/global/clonefunction.documentation: Generates a new closure based on the bytecode of `func`.

@roblox/global/getcallingscript.documentation: Returns the script responsible for the currently running function.

@roblox/global/hookfunction.documentation:
Replaces `func` with `hook` internally, where `hook` will be invoked in place of `func` when called. 

Returns a new function that can be used to access the original definition of `func`.

If `func` is a Luau function (`islclosure(func) --> true`), the upvalue count of `hook` must be less than or equal to that of `func`.

@roblox/global/iscclosure.documentation: Returns whether or not `func` is a closure whose source is written in C.

@roblox/global/islclosure.documentation: Returns whether or not `func` is a closure whose source is written in Luau.

@roblox/global/isexecutorclosure.documentation: Returns whether or not `func` was created by the executor.

@roblox/global/loadstring.documentation:
Generates a chunk from the given source code. The environment of the returned function is the global environment.

If there are no compilation errors, the chunk is returned by itself; otherwise, it returns `nil` plus the error message.

`chunkname` is used as the chunk name for error messages and debug information.

@roblox/global/newcclosure.documentation: Returns a C closure that wraps `func`. The result is functionally identical to `func`, but identifies as a C closure.

@roblox/global/rconsoleclear.documentation: Clears the output of the console window.

@roblox/global/rconsolecreate.documentation:
Opens the console window. Text previously output to the console will not be cleared.

⚠️  This function is disabled.

@roblox/global/rconsoledestroy.documentation: Clears the output of the console window.

@roblox/global/rconsoleinput.documentation:
Waits for the user to input text into the console window. Returns the result.

⚠️  This function is disabled.

@roblox/global/rconsoleinput/return/0.documentation: The text input by the user.

@roblox/global/rconsoleprint.documentation: Prints text to the console window. Does not clear existing text or create a new line.

@roblox/global/rconsoleprint/param/0.documentation: The text to print to the console.

@roblox/global/rconsolewarn.documentation: Prints text as a warning to the console window. Does not clear existing text or create a new line.

@roblox/global/rconsolewarn/param/0.documentation: The text to print as a warning to the console.

@roblox/global/rconsoleerror.documentation: Prints text as an error to the console window. Does not clear existing text or create a new line.

@roblox/global/rconsoleerror/param/0.documentation: The text to print as an error to the console.

@roblox/global/rconsolesettitle.documentation:
Sets the title of the console window to title.

⚠️  This function is disabled.

@roblox/global/rconsolesettitle/param/0.documentation: The new title for the console window.

@roblox/global/crypt.base64encode/param/.documentation: The string of bytes to encode.

@roblox/global/crypt.base64encode.documentation: Encodes a string of bytes into Base64.

@roblox/global/crypt.base64decode.documentation: Decodes a Base64 string to a string of bytes.

@roblox/global/crypt.encrypt/param/2.documentation: The AES IV. If not provided, a random one will be generated.

@roblox/global/crypt.encrypt/param/3.documentation: The cipher mode. Options are 'CBC', 'ECB', 'CTR', 'CFB', 'OFB', and 'GCM'. Default is 'CBC'.

@roblox/global/crypt.encrypt/return/0.documentation: The base64 encoded and encrypted string.

@roblox/global/crypt.encrypt/return/1.documentation: The base64 encoded IV, if one was generated.

@roblox/global/crypt.encrypt.documentation:
Encrypts an unencoded string using AES encryption. Returns the base64 encoded and encrypted string, and the IV.

If an AES IV is not provided, a random one will be generated for you, and returned as a 2nd base64 encoded string.

The cipher modes are 'CBC', 'ECB', 'CTR', 'CFB', 'OFB', and 'GCM'. The default is 'CBC'.

@roblox/global/crypt.decrypt/param/0.documentation: The base64 encoded and encrypted content to decrypt.

@roblox/global/crypt.decrypt/param/3.documentation: The cipher mode. Options are 'CBC', 'ECB', 'CTR', 'CFB', 'OFB', and 'GCM'.

@roblox/global/crypt.decrypt.documentation:
Decrypts the base64 encoded and encrypted content. Returns the raw string.

The cipher modes are 'CBC', 'ECB', 'CTR', 'CFB', 'OFB', and 'GCM'.

@roblox/global/crypt.generatebytes/param.documentation: The size of the random sequence to generate.

@roblox/global/crypt.generatebytes/retur.documentation: The base64 encoded random sequence of bytes.

@roblox/global/crypt.generatebytes.documentation: Generates a random sequence of bytes of the given size. Returns the sequence as a base64 encoded string.

@roblox/global/crypt.generatekey.documentation: Generates a base64 encoded 256-bit key. The result can be used as the second parameter for the crypt.encrypt and crypt.decrypt functions.

@roblox/global/crypt.hash/param/1.documentation: The hashing algorithm to use. Some algorithms include 'sha1', 'sha384', 'sha512', 'md5', 'sha256', 'sha3-224', 'sha3-256', and 'sha3-512'.

@roblox/global/crypt.hash/return/0.documentation: The result of hashing the data.

@roblox/global/crypt.hash.documentation:
Returns the result of hashing the data using the given algorithm.

Some algorithms include 'sha1', 'sha384', 'sha512', 'md5', 'sha256', 'sha3-224', 'sha3-256', and 'sha3-512'.

COMMENT: TODO: add debug differently than others because it's already in roblox and it breaks

@roblox/global/Drawing.documentation: A library for creating and manipulating 2D drawing objects.

@roblox/global/Drawing.new/param/0.documentation: The type of drawing object to create. Valid types are 'Line', 'Text', 'Image', 'Circle', 'Square', 'Quad', and 'Triangle'.

@roblox/global/Drawing.new.documentation: Create a new drawing object of the specified type.

@roblox/global/Drawing.Fonts.documentation: A table of font constants for use with Text drawing objects.

@roblox/global/cleardrawcache.documentation: Destroys every drawing object in the cache. Invalidates references to the drawing objects.

@roblox/global/getrenderproperty/param/0.documentation: The drawing object to get the property from.

@roblox/global/getrenderproperty/param/1.documentation: The name of the property to get.

@roblox/global/getrenderproperty.documentation: Gets the value of a property of a drawing. Functionally identical to drawing[property].

@roblox/global/isrenderobj/return/0.documentation: Whether the object is a valid Drawing object.

@roblox/global/isrenderobj.documentation: Returns whether the given object is a valid Drawing.

@roblox/global/setrenderproperty/param/0.documentation: The drawing object to set the property on.

@roblox/global/setrenderproperty/param/1.documentation: The name of the property to set.

@roblox/global/setrenderproperty/param/2.documentation: The new value for the property.

@roblox/global/setrenderproperty.documentation: Sets the value of a property of a drawing. Functionally identical to drawing[property] = value.

@roblox/global/readfile/param/0.documentation: The path to the file to read.

@roblox/global/readfile.documentation: Returns the contents of the file located at path.

@roblox/global/listfiles/param/0.documentation: The path to the folder to list files from.

@roblox/global/listfiles/return/0.documentation: A list of files and folders in the specified folder.

@roblox/global/listfiles.documentation: Returns a list of files and folders in the folder located at path. The returned list contains whole paths.

@roblox/global/writefile/param/0.documentation: The path to the file to write to.

@roblox/global/writefile/param/1.documentation: The data to write to the file.

@roblox/global/writefile.documentation: Writes data to the file located at path if it is not a folder.

@roblox/global/makefolder/param/0.documentation: The path to the folder to create.

@roblox/global/makefolder.documentation: Creates a folder at path if it does not already exist.

@roblox/global/appendfile/param/0.documentation: The path to the file to append to.

@roblox/global/appendfile/param/1.documentation: The data to append to the file.

@roblox/global/appendfile.documentation: Appends data to the end of the file located at path. Creates the file if it does not exist.

@roblox/global/isfile/return/0.documentation: Whether the path points to a file.

@roblox/global/isfile.documentation: Returns whether or not path points to a file.

@roblox/global/isfolder/return/0.documentation: Whether the path points to a folder.

@roblox/global/isfolder.documentation: Returns whether or not path points to a folder.

@roblox/global/delfile/param/0.documentation: The path to the file to delete.

@roblox/global/delfile.documentation: Removes the file located at path.

@roblox/global/delfolder/param/0.documentation: The path to the folder to delete.

@roblox/global/delfolder.documentation: Removes the folder located at path.

@roblox/global/loadfile/param/0.documentation: The path to the file to load.

@roblox/global/loadfile/param/1.documentation: The name to use for the chunk in error messages and debug information.

@roblox/global/loadfile/return/0.documentation: The loaded chunk as a function, or nil if there was an error.

@roblox/global/loadfile/return/1.documentation: The error message if there was an error.

@roblox/global/loadfile.documentation:
Generates a chunk from the file located at path. The environment of the returned function is the global environment.

If there are no compilation errors, the chunk is returned by itself; otherwise, it returns nil plus the error message.

chunkname is used as the chunk name for error messages and debug information.

@roblox/global/dofile/param/0.documentation: The path to the file to execute.

@roblox/global/dofile.documentation: Attempts to load the file located at path and execute it on a new thread.

@roblox/global/isrbxactive.documentation: Returns whether the game's window is in focus. Must be true for other input functions to work.

@roblox/global/mouse1click.documentation: Dispatches a left mouse button click.

@roblox/global/mouse1press.documentation: Dispatches a left mouse button press.

@roblox/global/mouse1release.documentation: Dispatches a left mouse button release.

@roblox/global/mouse2click.documentation: Dispatches a right mouse button click.

@roblox/global/mouse2press.documentation: Dispatches a right mouse button press.

@roblox/global/mouse2release.documentation: Dispatches a right mouse button release.

@roblox/global/mousemoveabs.documentation: Moves the mouse cursor to the specified absolute position.

@roblox/global/mousemoverel.documentation: Adjusts the mouse cursor by the specified relative amount.

@roblox/global/mousescroll.documentation: Dispatches a mouse scroll by the specified number of pixels.

@roblox/global/fireclickdetector/param/1.documentation: The distance from the player to the ClickDetector. Defaults to zero when absent.

@roblox/global/fireclickdetector.documentation: Dispatches a click or hover event to the given ClickDetector. When absent, distance defaults to zero.

@roblox/global/firetouchinterest/param/0.documentation: The instance with the TouchTransmitter to fire.

@roblox/global/firetouchinterest/param/1.documentation: The part that is touching the instance.

@roblox/global/firetouchinterest/param/2.documentation: Whether the touch is beginning (true) or ending (false).

@roblox/global/firetouchinterest.documentation: Simulates a touch event between two parts.
@roblox/global/firetouchinterest.code_sample:
local rootPart = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.HumanoidRootPart
firetouchinterest(workspace.TouchPart, rootPart, true)
firetouchinterest(workspace.TouchPart, rootPart, false)

@roblox/global/isnetworkowner/param/0.documentation: The part to check ownership of.

@roblox/global/isnetworkowner/return/0.documentation: Whether the part is owned by the player.

@roblox/global/isnetworkowner.documentation: Returns true if the Part is owned by the player.

@roblox/global/getcallbackvalue/param/0.documentation: The instance to get the callback from.

@roblox/global/getcallbackvalue/param/1.documentation: The name of the callback property.

@roblox/global/getcallbackvalue/return/0.documentation: The function assigned to the callback property, or nil if none is assigned.

@roblox/global/getcallbackvalue.documentation: Returns the function assigned to a callback property of object, which cannot be indexed normally.

@roblox/global/getconnections/param/0.documentation: The signal to get connections from.

@roblox/global/getconnections/return/0.documentation: A list of Connection objects for the functions connected to the signal.

@roblox/global/getconnections.documentation: Creates a list of Connection objects for the functions connected to signal.

@roblox/global/getconnection/param/0.documentation: The signal to get a connection from.

@roblox/global/getconnection/param/1.documentation: The index of the connection to get.

@roblox/global/getconnection/return/0.documentation: The Connection object at the specified index.

@roblox/global/getconnection.documentation: Returns a Connection object for index.

@roblox/global/firesignal.documentation: Fires all Lua connections of signal.

@roblox/global/getcustomasset/param/0.documentation: The path to the asset file.

@roblox/global/getcustomasset/return/0.documentation: A rbxasset:// content id for the asset.

@roblox/global/getcustomasset.documentation: Returns a rbxasset:// content id for the asset located at path, allowing you to use unmoderated assets. Internally, files are copied to the game's content directory.

@roblox/global/gethiddenproperty/param/0.documentation: The instance to get the property from.

@roblox/global/gethiddenproperty/param/1.documentation: The name of the property to get.

@roblox/global/gethiddenproperty.documentation:
Returns the value of a hidden property of object, which cannot be indexed normally.

If the property is hidden, the second return value will be true. Otherwise, it will be false.
@roblox/global/gethiddenproperty.code_sample:
local fire = Instance.new("Fire")
print(gethiddenproperty(fire, "size_xml")) --> 5, true
print(gethiddenproperty(fire, "Size")) --> 5, false

@roblox/global/setsimulationradius.documentation: Sets the player's simulationRadius. If maxSimulationRadius is specified, it will set that as well.

@roblox/global/gethui.documentation:
Returns a hidden GUI container. Should be used as an alternative to CoreGui and PlayerGui.

GUI objects parented to this container will be protected from common detection methods.

@roblox/global/getinstances/return/0.documentation: A list of every Instance referenced on the client.

@roblox/global/getinstances.documentation: Returns a list of every Instance referenced on the client.

@roblox/global/getnilinstances/return/0.documentation: A list of Instances that are not descendants of a service provider.

@roblox/global/getnilinstances.documentation: Like getinstances, but only includes Instances that are not descendants of a service provider.

@roblox/global/isscriptable/param/1.documentation: The name of the property to check.

@roblox/global/isscriptable/return/0.documentation: Whether the property is scriptable, or nil if the property does not exist.

@roblox/global/isscriptable.documentation:
Returns whether the given property is scriptable (does not have the notscriptable tag).

If true, the property is scriptable and can be indexed normally. If nil, the property does not exist.

@roblox/global/sethiddenproperty/param/0.documentation: The instance to set the property on.

@roblox/global/sethiddenproperty/param/1.documentation: The name of the property to set.

@roblox/global/sethiddenproperty/param/2.documentation: The new value for the property.

@roblox/global/sethiddenproperty.documentation: Sets the value of a hidden property of object, which cannot be set normally. Returns whether the property was hidden.
@roblox/global/sethiddenproperty.code_sample:
local fire = Instance.new("Fire")
print(sethiddenproperty(fire, "Size", 5)) --> false (not hidden)
print(sethiddenproperty(fire, "size_xml", 15)) --> true (hidden)
print(gethiddenproperty(fire, "size_xml")) --> 15, true (hidden)

@roblox/global/setrbxclipboard/param/0.documentation: The rbxm or rbxmx model data to set to the clipboard.

@roblox/global/setrbxclipboard.documentation: Sets the Studio client's clipboard to the given rbxm or rbxmx model data. This allows data from the game to be copied into a Studio client.
@roblox/global/setrbxclipboard.code_sample:
local data = readfile("model.rbxm")
setrbxclipboard(data) -- Can be pasted into Studio

@roblox/global/setscriptable/param/1.documentation: The name of the property to modify.

@roblox/global/setscriptable/param/2.documentation: Whether the property should be scriptable.

@roblox/global/setscriptable/return/0.documentation: Whether the property was scriptable prior to changing it.

@roblox/global/setscriptable.documentation: Set whether the given property is scriptable. Returns whether the property was scriptable prior to changing it.

@roblox/global/getrendersteppedlist/retu.documentation: A list of callbacks bound with RunService.BindToRenderStep.

@roblox/global/getrendersteppedlist.documentation: Returns all callbacks bound with RunService.BindToRenderStep.

@roblox/global/replicatesignal.documentation:
Replicates signal on the server.

If signal has one or multiple arguments, they must be provided in the call.
@roblox/global/replicatesignal.code_sample:
replicatesignal(game.Players.LocalPlayer.Kill) --> Kills you

local sword = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.ClassicSword
replicatesignal(sword.Activated) --> Swings the sword

@roblox/global/getrawmetatable/param/0.documentation: The table to get the metatable from.

@roblox/global/getrawmetatable.documentation: Returns the metatable of object, where the __metatable field would normally lock the metatable.

@roblox/global/hookmetamethod/param/0.documentation: The table with the metatable to hook.

@roblox/global/hookmetamethod/param/1.documentation: The name of the metamethod to hook.

@roblox/global/hookmetamethod/param/2.documentation: The function to replace the metamethod with.

@roblox/global/hookmetamethod/return/0.documentation: A function that can be used to access the original definition of the metamethod.

@roblox/global/hookmetamethod.documentation:
Replaces func with hook internally, where hook will be invoked in place of func when called.

Returns a new function that can be used to access the original definition of func.

@roblox/global/getnamecallmethod/return/.documentation: The name of the method that invoked the __namecall metamethod.

@roblox/global/getnamecallmethod.documentation: Returns the name of the method that invoked the __namecall metamethod.

@roblox/global/setnamecallmethod/param/0.documentation: The new method name to set.

@roblox/global/setnamecallmethod.documentation: Changes the name of the method that invoked __namecall metamethod.

@roblox/global/isreadonly/return/0.documentation: Whether the object is read-only or not.

@roblox/global/isreadonly.documentation: Returns whether object is read-only or not.

@roblox/global/setrawmetatable/param/0.documentation: The table to set the metatable on.

@roblox/global/setrawmetatable.documentation: Sets the metatable of object to metatable, where the __metatable field would normally lock the metatable.

@roblox/global/setreadonly/param/1.documentation: Whether the object should be read-only.

@roblox/global/setreadonly.documentation: Sets whether object is read-only or not.

@roblox/global/makereadonly.documentation: Freezes object, where table.freeze would normally check for __metatable.

@roblox/global/identifyexecutor.documentation: Returns the name and version of Potassium.

@roblox/global/lz4decompress/param/1.documentation: The size of the decompressed data.

@roblox/global/lz4decompress.documentation: Decompresses data using LZ4 compression, with the decompressed size specified by size.

@roblox/global/messagebox/param/0.documentation: The text to display in the message box.

@roblox/global/messagebox/param/1.documentation: The caption for the message box.

@roblox/global/messagebox/param/2.documentation: The flags to control the appearance and behavior of the message box.

@roblox/global/messagebox.documentation: Creates a message box with the specified text, caption, and flags. Yields until the message box is closed, and returns the user input code.

@roblox/global/queue_on_teleport/param/0.documentation: The code to execute after teleporting.

@roblox/global/queue_on_teleport.documentation: Queues the specified script to be executed after the player teleports to a different place.

@roblox/global/request/param/0.documentation: The options for the HTTP request.

@roblox/global/request.documentation: Sends an HTTP request using the specified options. Yields until the request is complete, and returns the response.

@roblox/global/getinternalparent/param/0.documentation: The instance to get the internal parent of.

@roblox/global/getinternalparent/return/.documentation: The internal parent of the instance.

@roblox/global/getinternalparent.documentation: Returns the internal parent field of the instance.

@roblox/global/getfflag/param/0.documentation: The name of the FFlag to get.

@roblox/global/setfflag/param/0.documentation: The name of the FFlag to set.

@roblox/global/setfflag/param/1.documentation: The new value for the FFlag.

@roblox/global/setfflag.documentation: Sets the value of fflag to value

@roblox/global/setinternalparent/param/1.documentation: The new internal parent for the instance.

@roblox/global/setinternalparent.documentation: Sets the internal parent field of `instance` to `newParent`

@roblox/global/setclipboard/param/0.documentation: The text to copy to the clipboard.

@roblox/global/setfpscap/param/0.documentation: The new FPS cap. Set to 0 to disable the cap.

@roblox/global/setfpscap.documentation: Sets the in-game FPS cap to fps. If fps is 0, the FPS cap is disabled.

@roblox/global/getgc/param/0.documentation: Whether to include tables in the list.

@roblox/global/getgc/return/0.documentation: A list of objects in the Luau garbage collector.

@roblox/global/getgc.documentation:
Returns a list of objects in the Luau garbage collector.

If includeTables is false, tables will not be included in the list.

@roblox/global/getgenv/return/0.documentation: The custom global environment of the executor.

@roblox/global/getgenv.documentation: Returns the custom global environment of the executor.

@roblox/global/gettenv/param/0.documentation: The thread to get the environment of.

@roblox/global/getloadedmodules/return/0.documentation: A list of ModuleScripts that have been loaded.

@roblox/global/getloadedmodules.documentation: Returns a list of ModuleScripts that have been loaded.

@roblox/global/getrenv/return/0.documentation: The global environment of the game client.

@roblox/global/getrenv.documentation: Returns the global environment of the game client. It can be used to access the global functions that LocalScripts and ModuleScripts use.

@roblox/global/getrunningscripts/return/.documentation: A list of scripts that are currently running.

@roblox/global/getrunningscripts.documentation: Returns a list of scripts that are currently running.

@roblox/global/getscriptbytecode/param/0.documentation: The script to get the bytecode from.

@roblox/global/getscriptbytecode/return/.documentation: The raw Luau bytecode of the script.

@roblox/global/getscriptbytecode.documentation: Returns the raw Luau bytecode of the given script.

@roblox/global/getscriptclosure/param/0.documentation: The script to generate a closure from.

@roblox/global/getscriptclosure/return/0.documentation: A new closure using the bytecode of the script.

@roblox/global/getscriptclosure.documentation: Generates a new closure using the bytecode of script.

@roblox/global/getscripthash/param/0.documentation: The script to get the hash of.

@roblox/global/getscripthash/return/0.documentation: A SHA384 hash of the script's bytecode.

@roblox/global/getscripthash.documentation: Returns a SHA384 hash of the script's bytecode.

@roblox/global/getscripts/return/0.documentation: A list of every script in the game.

@roblox/global/getscripts.documentation: Returns a list of every script in the game.

@roblox/global/getsenv/param/0.documentation: The script to get the environment of.

@roblox/global/getsenv/return/0.documentation: The global environment of the script.

@roblox/global/getsenv.documentation: Returns the global environment of the given script. It can be used to access variables and functions that are not defined as local.

@roblox/global/getthreadidentity/return/.documentation: The identity of the current thread.

@roblox/global/getthreadidentity.documentation: Returns the identity of the current thread.

@roblox/global/setthreadidentity/param/0.documentation: The new identity for the current thread.

@roblox/global/WebSocket/connect.documentation: Establishes a WebSocket connection to the specified URL.
@roblox/global/WebSocket/connect.code_sample:
local ws = WebSocket.connect("ws://localhost:8080")

ws.OnMessage:Connect(function(message)
	print(message)
end)

ws.OnClose:Connect(function()
	print("Closed")
end)

ws:Send("Hello, World!")

@roblox/global/WebSocketConnection/Send.documentation: Sends a message over the WebSocket connection.

@roblox/global/WebSocketConnection/OnMes.documentation: Fired when a message is received over the WebSocket connection.

@roblox/global/WebSocketConnection/OnClo.documentation: Fired when the WebSocket connection is closed.

@roblox/global/create_comm_channel/retur.documentation: The ID of the communication channel.
The `BindableEvent` associated with the communication channel.

@roblox/global/create_comm_channel.documentation: Returns the channel and the associated ID.

@roblox/global/get_comm_channel/param/0.documentation: The ID of the communication channel to get.

@roblox/global/get_comm_channel/return/0.documentation: The `BindableEvent` associated with the communication channel, or `nil` if it doesn't exist.

@roblox/global/get_comm_channel.documentation: Returns the communication channel if it exists.

@roblox/global/run_on_actor/param/0.documentation: The `Actor` to run the script on.

@roblox/global/run_on_actor/param/1.documentation: The script code to run on the actor as a string.

@roblox/global/run_on_actor.documentation: Runs a script on an actor thread.

@roblox/global/getactors/return/0.documentation: A table of all `Actor` instances that exist within the game.

@roblox/global/getactors.documentation: Returns a table of all `Actor` instances that exist within the game.

@roblox/global/is_parallel/return/0.documentation: Whether the current thread is running on an `Actor`.

@roblox/global/is_parallel.documentation: Returns if the current thread is running on an `Actor`.

@roblox/global/run_on_thread/param/0.documentation: The `thread` to run the script on.

@roblox/global/run_on_thread/param/1.documentation: The script code to run on the thread as a string.

@roblox/global/run_on_thread.documentation: Runs a script on a specified thread, actor threads only.

@roblox/global/getactorthreads/return/0.documentation: A table of all `thread` objects that belong to actors.

@roblox/global/getactorthreads.documentation: Returns all `thread` objects that belong to actors in a table.
